title: Need to know the name of this font...
content:
Hi.  
I’m Pico and I’m a fontoholic.

Well, almost. I’m looking for the typeface used on this picture; [http://wtf.myfonts.com/images/a1/a167b91fe4692a44bbbd34e6593af579.8646.j...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141722/http:/wtf.myfonts.com/images/a1/a167b91fe4692a44bbbd34e6593af579.8646.jpeg "http://wtf.myfonts.com/images/a1/a167b91fe4692a44bbbd34e6593af579.8646.jpeg")

I do have an outlined (the original) version if it could help you, though I doubt it even exists separately.

Thanks in advance & blame Canada.  
/pico

 [‹ don't know what font this is, please help!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33198 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ensemble - Kontrapunkt (Sans) {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821141722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33170 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Pico

comments.content: I don’t know what it is, but it looks like it’s been stretched horizontally.

Hmm, some of the letters from those were nearly spot-on, though the a:s does not quite resemble my sample.

Should I fear the worst; that it’s custom designed?
Custom, and not very well executed.
